color.description:: The right color. This can be overridden by the query string.

labelColor.description:: The left color. This can be overridden by the query string.

isError.description:: true to treat this as an error badge

namedLogo.description:: One of the named logos supported by Shields or simple-icons. Can be overridden by the query string.

logoSvg.description:: A png string base64 containing a custom logo Must be less than 8000 bytes

logoColor.description:: Set the color of the logo (hex, rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla and css named colors supported). Supported for named logos but not for custom logos.

logoWidth.description:: Set the horizontal space to give to the logo

logoPosition.description:: Same meaning as the query string. Can be overridden by the query string. Only works for named logos

style.description:: The different styles provided from shields.io

cacheSeconds.description:: Set the HTTP cache lifetime (rules are applied to infer a default value on a per-badge basis, any values specified below the default will be ignored). The legacy name "maxAge" is also supported.
